title: Brendan Smith : making a difference in Rutherglen
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Country life - Psychological aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Community - Moral and ethical aspects
abstract: 'What can I do for you ladies?' Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Indigo'.
description: A self proclaimed 'Average Joe', Brendan Smith offers his insatiable enthusiasm and passion for all things audio visual, installing professional standard lighting and sound equipment in Rutherglen's local hall, making it possible for everyone in the community to connect with the arts.
